body.description: Microsoft Arc mouse is designed to conform comfortably to your hand — and snaps flat to fit easily in your bag. The next generation of our best-selling Arc touch mouse, Microsoft Arc mouse features numerous refinements, including the ability to scroll both vertically and horizontally. Connects via Bluetooth. Now available in a choice of rich colors1 to complement your style.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.6 4.6 out of 5 stars 18,275 ratings 4.6 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The travel companion for your Windows 10 PC Microsoft Arc Mouse is designed to conform to your hand — and snaps flat to fit easily in your bag. Connects via Bluetooth.

Ultra-slim and lightweight Ultra-slim and lightweight, Microsoft Arc Mouse goes anywhere without the weight or bulk of traditional mice. What’s more, you can snap it flat and easily slip it in your pocket or bag for travel. Arc Mouse connects wirelessly to your Windows 10 PC via Bluetooth

Power up or down with a snap Microsoft Arc Mouse features an audible, satisfying snap. Simply snap Arc Mouse into its curved position to power up. Snap again to flatten and power down. The overall design is optimized for the most comfortable, natural interaction.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Microsoft Arc Mouse - A Stylish and Portable Companion
reviews.reviewText: The Microsoft Arc Mouse is not your ordinary mouse; it's a unique and stylish accessory that I've come to appreciate. Although it takes a bit of time to adjust to its unconventional design, once you do, it proves to be an excellent mouse. The absence of wires and the compact, foldable design make it incredibly convenient for on-the-go use. I can even carry it in my pocket without any hassle.One of its standout features is the impressive battery life. I've been using it for months, and the battery level is still around 70%. Not only does it offer longevity, but it also delivers a satisfying and precise performance. The Bluetooth connection is reliable, and the mouse glides effortlessly across the screen.It's worth noting that the Microsoft Arc Mouse doesn't support left and right-clicking simultaneously. However, for everyday tasks, browsing, and office work, this mouse is perfect. The ergonomic design ensures a comfortable grip, and the sleek aesthetics perfectly complement my Surface computer. If you value a good design and portability, this mouse is a fantastic choice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It’s incredible!I bought several of this mouse because they are excellent.They connect fast, it reacts to excellent, it is easy to move place to place, the feeling is something different but in a good way, it is part of your hand it is very durable I have it for 3 years and it stays perfect the battery last

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Microsoft Arc Mouse in sleek black is an absolute gem in the realm of computer peripherals. With its innovative design, this mouse redefines comfort and portability. Its ultra-slim and lightweight build make it a standout companion for both PC and Mac users.The ergonomic design of the Arc Mouse ensures a comfortable grip, allowing for extended use without strain. The mouse's flexibility is impressive; it can be flattened for easy storage, making it an excellent travel companion. The Bluetooth connectivity is seamless and hassle-free, eliminating the need for dongles or cords.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Flawless connection and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use with my MacBook. I have a couple of these, but they are USB type a and the MacBook only has USB type C on it. This is Bluetooth and it works flawlessly with my computer. It is very economic and super easy to travel with as it straightens out to a flat piece. My only suggestion would be to include a small case with it, that you could carry it in your bag without it getting dirty. I had a little sleeve hanging around and I use that when I travel, but everything else is perfect for this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 10, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic Premium Device - Sage (Green)
reviews.reviewText: Love it, highly recommend.Scroll - Excellent - Up/Down, Left/Right. Smooth motion, sensitive , no lag. A pleasure.Aesthetics - Excellent - It's gorgeous. I went with 'Sage' (ie green), I feel the soft matte patina and muted pastel color could align my chi. ; )Portability - Excellent - Best portable mouse out there? V likely. It’s light, collapses to a slim iPhone like profile, u can put it in ur pocket and the biggest bonus is in a bag; there’s no bump.Pairing - Excellent - Putting the Arc in pairing mode is easy enough, press a small button on the base. It is easily discoverable, super quick to connect (to anything) and no lag after connecting, on par w Logitech MX's.Build Quality - V Good - It looks/feels expensive, materials r top notch. While it’s build quality is v good and the collapse/expand mechanism will hold up the Arc isn’t quite as durable as a Logitech MX Anywhere 2S. Don’t get me wrong it’s better than just about anything else out there but the price point puts it into Logi MX territory.Software & Customization - V Good - U can download Microsoft’s ‘Mouse & Keyboard Center’ app. The app installs quickly, detects the device without any hesitation and u can’t tell it’s there (doesn’t affect system speed or boot time). The app allows for button & scroll customization. It has a broad selection presets and you can add your own key combos, the preset selection isn’t as good as ‘Logitech Options’ but u can get around that by entering keyboard shortcuts. Something to note is u don’t need the app (unless you want to customize), the Arc is great without it.Palm Fit - The Arc fits nicely in your palm, it’s arch angle is well contoured and it’s v light. I found myself using it with my thumb and middle finger tips.3 Finger click - Excellent - It's customizable and works every time.Battery Life - Not sure - Business partner has an Arc, hence can expect at least 1yr. The Arc comes w 2 x Duracell AAA batteries. I like the way it’s not rechargeable.Wake up time - Excellent - No wiggle necessary, it's almost immediate. If you look for it you can see a .4 or .5 inch movement is all it takes. Please note that also depends on the system it's paired with.Final thoughts. If u r looking for aesthetics + performance this is for u. The Arc is a premium product that delivers on everything; functionality, performance, portability and looks/feel. I especially like it's light weight and the way it eliminates that awkward computer case/valise/bag bump. Where it falls short is within this price point it should have multiple device functionality. That feature is more than a 'nice have', a portable mouse always needs to connect to more than its primary device (for multiple reasons). This missing feature is kind of a big one, hence I deducted 1 star. By comparison the Logi MX Anywhere has 3 device options. Would I recommend the Logi MX over the Arc? No. The Logi has a slight edge on functionality but the Arc is an overachiever in it's own right and more than perfect for my purposes.What Microsoft should do is compliment the product with a desktop version...Add volume, fwd/rev functions but still make it collapsible so you can easily carry it between meetings or stick in your drawer etc..

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit the bill but not rechargeable
reviews.reviewText: Love that this mouth is light weight and feels good in my hand. It was a very simple setup with my new laptop. The only thing I wish is that it had a rechargeable lithium battery like the Apple mouse. Other than that a nice simple and easy to use mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had the mouse for about 2 year and 9 months before it stopped working properly. I had to call MS twice and the first person was not very helpful, but the second person that I talked to resolved my issue and replaced the mouse under the three year warranty.I had a similar mouse for travel with and loved it it shut the battery off when you lay it flat. That mouse is over 6 year old and works fine. It has great feel and got one a few years back for home (the one that went bad). I would highly recommend this mouse especially if you travel or want have a Bluetooth mouse. Flatten it and the battery shuts down.Not to mention the great support.Thank you MS.
En lo personal esta version del mause de microsoft es muy comodo, ademas de que incluye mas funciones de desplazamiento (horizontal)-- MUY PRACTICO Y COMODO al tacto..lo super recomiendo..

I love these bluetooth Microsoft arc mouse. They fold flat so they dont take up much room in your backpack and since its buetooth you dont need that extra dongle. Easy to pair, and comfortable to use. No issues so far. Would recommend for anyone needing an easy to tote mouse.
Very cool red! Product works as described. Easy to set up and use. I recommend.

O mouse é bom, as vezes tenho problema com o bluethoot, porem, dos periféricos conectados, o mouse raramente não funciona, é bem estável. Comprei em 30/03/2022 e só hoje 18/07/2022 esta me dando aviso de 5% de pilha, ou seja dura uns 4 meses (uso pra trabalho das 8~18h, de segunda a sexta). Tive um pequeno desconforto no começo pois o dedinho fica voando na lateral do mouse, que é bem diferente dos padrões, com o tempo acostuma, nada dramático. Não tenho do que reclamar, sempre quis esse mouse e não me arrependi de comprar. Vendedor enviou super rápido, comprei dia 29 e dia 30 já tinha chego; O mouse é bonito e chamou a atenção da empresa inteira quando eu adquiri. Ele "dobra", posição reta fica desligado e economiza pilha, a posição curvada esta ligado e pronto pra uso. Apesar de ter só 1 botão, ele cumpre as funções clicando pelo lado direito/esquerdo, o scroll é touch e funciona em qualquer parte dos botões, tanto na vertical como na horizontal, só sinto falta do botão de scroll mesmo pelas suas funções, mas ta bão. Demorei pra escrever a revisão pois queria um tempo de testes.
Encantada por la comodidad, precisión y agilidad.
